BattleEvents

The current Battle Events taking place. These are completed before the next BattleEntity's turn takes place.

PendingBattleEvents

The pending Battle Events waiting to be added. They are added once the Battle State matches the state they should be added in.

CurHighestPriority

The current, highest priority of Battle Events taking place. Once these are all done, the next highest priority of Battle Events is found and takes place.

AddPendingEvents()

Adds pending Battle Events if the BattleState is the state that matches the state they're added in.

| Improve this Doc View Source

QueueBattleEvent(Int32, BattleGlobals.BattleState[], BattleEvent)

Places a Battle Event on the pending list.

If the current BattleState matches a BattleState the Battle Event takes effect in, it will take effect immediately. Otherwise, it will wait and take effect once the current BattleState matches.

Declaration
public void QueueBattleEvent(int priority, BattleGlobals.BattleState[] battleStates, BattleEvent battleEvent)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 priority

The priority the Battle Event has. Must be greater than or equal to 0.
BattleGlobals.BattleState[] battleStates

The BattleStates the Battle Event takes effect in. If none are specified, the event isn't added.
BattleEvent battleEvent

The Battle Event to add.
